name: Brand View
tag_list: retailers, manufacturers, fmcg, bws, hb, health-and-beauty, price-tracking, price-monitoring, competitor-movement, competitor-monitoring
overview:
Brand View is an international provider of real-time price and promotion analytics.

Brand View enables clients to measure and manage their price position and communicate this to shoppers. Trusted by the biggest names in grocery, health & beauty, BWS and non-food, Brand View’s easy to use, powerful analytics give clients an unparalleled insight into the competitor landscape.

Seamless coverage of online and bricks and mortar stores – including Australian, European and North American markets – facilitates immediate benchmarking of value proposition and promotional activity against competitors through instant, integrated insights into when prices change, promotions begin, and new products are listed.

To learn more, visit the Brand View website (http://www.brandview.com).

For a free 14-day evaluation, visit http://www.brandview.com/freetrial
